ball.util.ant.taskdefs

Interface ConfigurableAntTask

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AntTaskMixIn
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CardTask, CardTask.PokerHandEvaluate, DownloadTask, HTTPTask, HTTPTask.Delete, HTTPTask.Get, HTTPTask.Head, HTTPTask.Options, HTTPTask.Patch, HTTPTask.Post, HTTPTask.Put, HTTPTask.Request, LifeTask, ObjectMapperTask, ObjectMapperTask.ReadValue, PersistenceTask, PersistenceTask.GenerateSchema, PersistenceTask.ListProviders, ScrabbleTask, ScrabbleTask.WordsFor, SessionTask, SessionTask.ProviderListTask, SessionTask.StoreListTask, SSDPDiscoverTask, SudokuTask, UUIDTask, UUIDTask.From, UUIDTask.Generate, UUIDTask.GenerateRandom, UUIDTask.GenerateTime, UUIDTask.Null, XDTask, XDTask.Load, XDTask.Solve, XPathEvaluateTask

    public interface ConfigurableAntTask
extends AntTaskMixIn
    Provides default Task.init() method to initialize Task attributes from project properties.
    Version:
    $Revision: 5285 $
    Author:
    Allen D. Ball

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void configure()
      Default method to configure Task attributes.
      default void init()
      Default implementation for Task subclasses.
